artist: After Adriaen van Ostade; David Deuchar
description:
two images mounted on one sheet:
top image: mother, daughter and baby in a doorway; copy in reverse

lower image: a smoker and a drinker in an interior; smoker seated, drinker standing; jug on floor; copy in reverse
dimension:
3 5/16 × 2 5/8 in. (8.41 × 6.67 cm) (image, sheet, upper image)
3 1/8 × 2 7/16 in. (7.94 × 6.19 cm) (image, sheet, lower image)
11 13/16 × 9 7/16 in. (30 × 23.97 cm) (mount)
marks:
Signature and Inscription

top image in plate in See Inscription
title: Print
